com.sri.ai.grinder.tester

Interface TheoryTestingSupport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTheoryTestingSupport, AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtomsTestingSupport, BruteForceFunctionTheoryTestingSupport, CompoundTheoryTestingSupport, DifferenceArithmeticTheoryTestingSupport, EqualityTheoryTestingSupport, LinearRealArithmeticTheoryTestingSupport, PropositionalTheoryTestingSupport, TupleTheoryTestingSupport

    @Beta
public interface TheoryTestingSupport
    Interface for wrappers around Theory objects that know how to generate problems for testing.
    Author:
    braz

      • makeRandomAtomOn

        Expression makeRandomAtomOn(java.lang.String variable,
                            Context context)
        Returns a random atom in this theory on a given variable. This is useful for making random constraints for correctness and performance testing.
        Parameters:
        variable - the name of the variable to make the random atom on.
        context - a context

        static TheoryTestingSupport make(java.util.Random random,
                                 TheoryTestingSupport... theoryTestingSupports)

      • make

        static TheoryTestingSupport make(java.util.Random random,
                                 Theory theory)
        Creates an appropriate TheoryTestingSupport object given a Theory and a Random. Recognized theories are:
        • CompoundTheory
        • DifferenceArithmeticTheory
        • EqualityTheory
        • LinearRealArithmeticTheory
        • PropositionalTheory
        • BruteForceFunctionTheory
        • TupleTheory

        An UnsupportedOperationException is thrown if an unrecognized theory is provided.

        Parameters:
        random -
        theory -
        Returns:
